TopicTitle: Where's the light switch in vab

Articles.Content:
I put lights on just about every part. Always facing a docking port. Sometimes in a random spot for longer items.

Then when you bring them together you realize you put to many or to little.

I've been using the wide angle near docking ports to minimize some light.

Also would like to see what different colors look like before spending all that time getting items up there just to realize it won't work.

Light switch turn vab lights off and all lights placed on.

Then you can still turn each one on and off individualyb
